=================
cp2077-extractor
=================

.. start short_desc

**Work in progress audio/music extractor for Cyberpunk 2077.**

.. end short_desc


.. start shields

Installation
--------------

.. start installation

``cp2077-extractor`` can be installed from PyPI.

To install with ``pip``:

.. code-block:: bash

	$ python -m pip install cp2077-extractor

.. end installation
